Translations.Text: Day win ieoan ar ayen i k d irsen, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep, am win idre$len? Siwa uaqilen id ismektayen
Wid iiifen di laaqed n Oebbi, ur poueun nnesba
Wid issemlilen ayen id Iumeo Oebbi ad imlil, u ppagwaden Mass nnsen, u ppagwaden aqeiii adiran
Wid iueboen, ssaramen udem n Mass nnsen, bedden i teallit, pseddiqen seg wayen is iten N$at, s tuffra u ainani, swexxioen tucmip s yise$. I nitni, agwav s Axxam
Leonanat n Aaden ara kecmen, akked wid ixeddmen ayen ilhan, seg ibabaten nnsen, si tlawin nnsen, si tarwa nnsen. Lmalayek a d ppasent $uosen si yal tabburt
Tifrat fellawen, ilmend n wayen tueboem! D asaadi, wagwav s Axxam
Wid ipoueun laaqed n Oebbi, deffir lemwafaqa s, wid igezmen ayen d Iumeo Oebbi ad imlil, u ssefsaden di tmurt, wigi, i nitni xezzu, i nitni yir axxam
Oebbi Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen. Taaoeb iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Tameddurt n ddunit, d urar kan, zdat laxeot
La qqaoen wid ijehlen: "a lemmer id iris, $uoes, ussekni s$uo Mass is"! Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, Itellif win i S ihwan. Inehhu $uoeS, wid isteooiaen
wid iumnen, iwumi itheddin wul, mara d mmektin Oebbi". Ni$, s usmekti n Oebbi, pheddinen wulawen
Ssaad, akked taggara igerzen, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan
Akka ay k id Nuzen, i lois id zwaren leoyus, ad asen temlev, ayen ik d Nweeea. Nitni jehlen $uo Uenin. Ini: "Neppa d Mass iw, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa; ppekle$ fellaS, asteooaa iw $uoeS

A lemmer kan Leqwoan isselea idurar, iceqqeq tamurt, ne$ issenieq ed lmeggtin! Xaii! Lumuo akw i Oebbi. Day ur eoin ara wid iumnen, ar, ma ihwa yaS, Oebbi ad Inhu medden meooa? Zgan wid ijehlen a ten tewwet ssixia, ilmend n wayen xeddmen. Ne$ a ppevou ar tama n yixxamen nnsen, alamma tusa d lemaahda n Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ipzeggil ppaaud
Ni$ mmaalken, uqbel ik, deg imazanen. Ooi$ lmudda i wid ijehlen, sinna, Iife$ ten. A yaaaqeb iW imiren

Day Win Ibedden, ar yal amdan, $ef wayen iksebâ€¦? Curken aS i Oebbi. Ini: "semmit asen! Ne$, ad aS temlem ayen ur Ieoi di tmurt? Ne$ d ismawen n tkerkas"? Xaii! Wid ijehlen, aaobent pen nncub nnsen. Ppuveoofen seg ubrid. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai w ara t inhun
Fellasen aaaqeb, di tmeddurt n ddunit. Aaaqeb n laxert, s tidep, aaer. Ur sain ara ten ifukken, seg ufus n Oebbi
